## QwikSpeakInlineOptions interface

Qwik Speak Inline Vite Plugin Options

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface QwikSpeakInlineOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [assetsPath?](./inline.qwikspeakinlineoptions.assetspath.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Path to translation files: \[basePath\]/\[assetsPath\]/\[lang\]/\*.json. Default to 'public/i18n' |
|  [basePath?](./inline.qwikspeakinlineoptions.basepath.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The base path. Default to './' |
|  [defaultLang](./inline.qwikspeakinlineoptions.defaultlang.md) |  | string | Default lang. Required |
|  [keySeparator?](./inline.qwikspeakinlineoptions.keyseparator.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Separator of nested keys. Default is '.' |
|  [keyValueSeparator?](./inline.qwikspeakinlineoptions.keyvalueseparator.md) |  | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Key-value separator. Default is '<!-- -->@<!-- -->@<!-- -->' |
|  [splitChunks?](./inline.qwikspeakinlineoptions.splitchunks.md) |  | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> If true, split chunks by lang |
|  [supportedLangs](./inline.qwikspeakinlineoptions.supportedlangs.md) |  | string\[\] | Supported langs. Required |
